nodes.text: Reek Payvees was a male Gran who was targeted for death by an unknown individual for being a "worthless scum" during the waning years pof the Republic Classic era. His bounty, set for 5,000 credits, was collected by Jango Fett in 32 BBY. Reek also had a wanted brother called Neeko Payvees, who was also considered a "worthless scum" by this unknown individual and whose bounty was also claimed by the Mandalorian bounty hunter.
